inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed follicular lymphoma grade I-IIIa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage IA or IIA (no more than 2 contiguous nodal regions) non bulky (<7 cm)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Staging with PET-CT, bone marrow biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Qualitative/quantitative PCR basal evaluation of Bcl-2/IgH rearranged cells in peripheral blood and bone marrow
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Stage greater than II with more than 2 nodal sites and/or B symptoms and/or bulky disease (>7 cm)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
